section_title.title: Become a part of our big family to inspire and get inspired by professional experts.

items.title: Software Developer
items.description: Strong knowledge & experience with at least one of the programming languages: JS, Java, Python, C++, C# or Go. Algorithmic thinking, experience with design patterns and data structures, ability to cut bigger software apps with the use of industry standard frameworks.

items.title: QA Automation Engineer
items.description: Experience with SW testing. Excellent logical thinking ability, good problem solving, collaboration, and communication skills.

items.title: Junior Developer
items.description: Experience with at least one of the programming languages: JS, Java, Python, C++, C# or Go.

section_title.title: Pay a visit & have some coffee!

items.title: Career development
items.description: Our service offerings cover all phases including planning, design, architecture, MVP development, QA, operation, support, and iterative evolution.

items.title: Training and learning
items.description: Develop and propose product improvements through periodical and accurate testing, repairing & refining every version.

items.title: Vacation
items.description: It's more than a responsibility but a guarantee from us to gain customer trust with highly reliable quality control system.

items.title: Passion and excitement
items.description: At Bonitoo, we have a long experience with maintenance and operation of existing systems deployed both on premise and cloud.

items.title: Highly Professional Staffs
items.description: Having obtained the official & formal training in IT technology and technical fields, our staffs know more than what they show.

items.title: Product Management Services
items.description: We offer product management services like market analysis, benchmarks, competitors, financial analysis, roadmap planning, trainings, workshops, etc.

headings.content: Obtaining further information by make a contact with us.

texts.content:
